4304280.name: Necromancer’s Domain
4304280.description:
Necromancer’s Domain is a dark fantasy dungeon management game where you play as a necromancer.
Slay intruders, harvest their corpses, and raise an ever-growing undead army.
Design a labyrinth that descends five underground floors, then defend it with smart room layouts, traps, and minions.

Turn Corpses into Power

Defeated intruders become corpse resources. Use them to create undead like zombies and skeletons, and expand your forces over time.

Undead aren’t just soldiers—they’re workers too.
Assign them to gather stone, wood, and iron, powering your dungeon’s growth.

Build, Research, Craft, Train

Your dungeon is more than corridors and traps. Construct specialized rooms to push your domain forward:

  • Library: research new technologies and upgrades

  • Workshop: craft equipment for your forces

  • Training: strengthen your undead troops

  • Farm: secure food for your living servants

  • Prison: capture intruders for interrogation and torture (text-based), with grim consequences…

Artifacts Change Everything

The world holds Artifacts—relics of immense power.

Some adventurers enter your dungeon already empowered by artifacts, making them deadly threats.
But if you seize an artifact, it becomes yours—granting powerful benefits and even reshaping how your dungeon operates.

Create different “domains” depending on your relics and choices:
poison-filled halls, flooded floors haunted by drowned corpses, or a scorched labyrinth where blazing undead roam.
As your domain grows stronger, you may even forge legendary artifacts of your own.

Many Ways to Break an Adventuring Party

Intruders come for many reasons: treasure, materials, revenge, rescue missions, or artifacts.
How will you stop them?

  • Overwhelm them with zombie hordes

  • Hold choke points with barricades + skeleton archers

  • Grind them down in trap-lined corridors

  • Weaken them with poison and attrition

  • Drop them through pits to lower floors

  • Arm zombies with cannons and repeating ballistae

Your dungeon is deeply customizable—your strategy is your signature.

Conquer the World Above

Beyond the dungeon, the world map opens new options: raid and conquer villages and towns, and wage war against nations of dwarves and elves.

The more evil you commit, the stronger your enemies become—until a hero leading an army may appear.
Appoint resurrected or hired commanders to lead squads, oversee training, and manage labor to increase efficiency and power.

Turn death into resources. Expand your labyrinth. Build a domain of terror.
Necromancer’s Domain delivers a heavy dark fantasy experience presented primarily through 2D illustrations and text.

Key Features

  • Dungeon management as a necromancer across five underground floors

  • Defeat intruders and convert corpses into undead

  • A satisfying loop of gathering → research → crafting → training

  • Diverse facilities: library, workshop, prison, farms, and more

  • Defense strategy built from traps, rooms, squads, and elemental gimmicks

  • Artifacts that change your dungeon’s playstyle—steal them or forge your own

  • World map raids, conquest, and war; rising notoriety makes enemies stronger

  • Assign commanders to boost troop performance and labor efficiency
